comment: The division algorithm (theorem). Dividing an integer ` N ` by a nonzero integer ` D ` produces a (unique) quotient ` q ` and a unique remainder ` 0 <_ r < ( abs `` D ) ` . Theorem 1.14 in [ApostolNT] p. 19. The proof does not use ` / ` or ` |_ ` or ` mod ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Mar-2011.)
